item.description:
Join us behind the Tsongas Center at UMass Lowell, along the scenic Merrimack River and enjoy a  summer evening of FREE music as "The Island Castaways" take the stage paying tribute to Jimmy Buffet like only they know how to do.

http://www.tsongascenter.com/event_details.php?id=107

The show takes place on the Tsongas Center back lawn, 6:00 - 8:00PM.

RAIN OR SHINE

** In the event of rain shows will be moved into the Tsongas Center lobby.

Admission is FREE!

Bring blankets or lawn chairs.

-- Food, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages will be available for purchase.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Free Backyard Music Series
